locations.title: Givhans Ferry State Park
locations.content: Givhans Ferry State Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a nice state park. There are some trails, and the campgrounds are nice. The bathrooms are relatively clean and the shower had hot water. There were no hooks for the shower.

… the Edisto River. It's great for camping, hiking or spending the day to picnic. They have covered shelters, good for parties or showers. I've been to a wedding shower here for a friend and you had plenty of parking and space. You do have to …

… , a lot of volunteer veterans. Every day they were out working and making improvements on the park and amenities. Camp sites were nice and restrooms/shower were always clean and neet. Close to Summerville and under an hour from Charleston.

… the process of renovation, sites are covered in new limerock which tracks into the camper, men's bathhouse only had one shower working, floor held water and the River Rock is nice and slip resistant but will be hard to sanitize, visitor …
Very nice park I attended for my in laws baby shower. Would've been a 5 star rating if they provided trash bins at the gazebo area. Other then that very nice place to visit with the family.
Wonderful place to take the family especially the kids. Nice clean camping areas. Bathroom/shower house is nice. Beach/river access is wonderful.

locations.content: Isle of Palms County Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: A great place for beach. We visited it on Wednesday, not crowded. Have shower, changing station, picnic table, playground and restroom. Well worth $15. Safeguards serve well. Area under the pier is a good spot to avoid sun burn. Walked from …

Such a nice, clean, beautiful outdoor space! Free public showers - probably 20 shower heads for rinsing off which was so convenient. The bathrooms are very clean and well kept. Makes for easy access to the beach. The free showers are really …

… to put chairs if you didn't have an umbrella or shade with you. Place also has changing rooms, a station to shower body and feet, and even misting stations to cool down. Some shells, but is busy place and distance from water to stairs is …
… Restroom, change rooms, shower to clean from the send, small playground, small kiosk and Volleyball court
Great park and beach access. Dressing arrangements, bathrooms and shower area were fantastic.
Positives: Large parking lot. Two different shower areas, real bathrooms, outdoor changing stalls, picnic tables, playground, large beach, pier, easy location to find. Popsicle and snack stand! …
Nice spot for relaxing in the beach with shower and clothes changing facilities. And bring your fur babies too

Love it, all amenities even wash house with private shower stalls and bathroom changing areas. Clean ,well kept and attended. Closes before area attractions like restaurants and shops tho not so great ,if you don't notice the time. Beach is …

Iop is always our go to beach spot. Very clean and they've upgraded the shower sections and bathrooms. There's even a bar with super cute hammocks section that's right at the bottom of the stairs where it separates the bar and that …

Love coming to the beach here, the waves are perfect for body bordering. They have shower areas and changing stalls there too. Rentals for chairs and umbrellas. Just got to pay for parking at the front gate.

showerReviews.reviewText: We love this pool.  It is never too busy or overcrowded.  During the summer months the pool is cleaned frequently.  There are enough chaise lounge chairs to handle most crowds.  There are bathrooms and an outdoor shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough about the staff and facilities at North Charleston Aquatic Center. They are truly oriented towards serving the people and are genuinely dedicated to providing the best possible experience for all. All staff members are …
A well managed and clean facility. Lap swim and open swim times, $5 for non members per use

Great size! They have two major sides : training pool and competition pool.

Right now with Covid though there are restrictions.  No showers.  That was a …

This indoor aquatics center is quite accommodating with multiple areas to swim. There are multiple pools for swim meets and have open swim during specific times of the day. This facility houses full size changing rooms, showers, lockers, and restrooms.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Bridgette Donaldson (देवी ब्री - Devee Bree)_This_indoor_aquatics_center_is_quite_accommodating_Edited 3 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean, spacious, up-to-date facility. Plenty of parking and restrooms for visitors. Pools are great
